text: For Once in My Life is the tenth studio album by American singer-songwriter Stevie Wonder on Motown Records. It was released in December 1968, his second album that year. ==Track listing== #"For Once in My Life" (Ron Miller, Orlando Murden) 2:48 #"Shoo-Be-Doo-Be-Doo-Da-Day" (Henry Cosby, Sylvia Moy, Stevie Wonder) 2:45 #"You Met Your Match" (Lula Mae Hardaway, Don Hunter, Stevie Wonder) 2:37 #"I Wanna Make Her Love Me" (Henry Cosby, Lula Mae Hardaway, Sylvia Moy, Stevie Wonder) 2:52 #"I'm More Than Happy (I'm Satisfied)" (Henry Cosby, Cameron Grant, Sylvia Moy, Stevie Wonder) 2:56 #"I Don't Know Why" (Lula Mae Hardaway, Don Hunter, Paul Riser, Stevie Wonder) 2:46 #"Sunny" (Bobby Hebb) 4:00 #"I'd Be a Fool Right Now" (Henry Cosby, Sylvia Moy, Stevie Wonder) 2:54 #"Ain't No Lovin'" (Lula Mae Hardaway, Don Hunter, Paul Riser, Stevie Wonder) 2:36 #"God Bless the Child" (Arthur Herzog Jr., Billie Holiday) 3:27 #"Do I Love Her" (Stevie Wonder) 2:58 #"The House on the Hill" (L. Brown, Berry Gordy, Allen Story) 2:36 ==References== Category:1968 albums Category:R&B; albums Category:Soul albums
title: For Once in My Life (album)
